misc/

is_sorted.pro


top source is_sorted

Misc

result = is_sorted(array)

Checks whether an array is already sorted.

Parameters

array in

An array to check.

Examples

IDL> print, is_sorted([0,10,15,25]) 1 IDL> print, is_sorted([0,15,10,25]) 0
